column5: Comfortable bedroom with private entrance through the garage or entrance through the front door. You will have access to a full bathroom directly down the hall, our kitchen if needed, and our backyard space with grill and bar (two local beers always on tap ;) There is a mini fridge in the room. Wifi is available. Great space for one or two people visiting town. A mile away from Addison and a great restaurant/bar scene. Located about 25 min Uber ride from DFW Airport.
